document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2014-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, ADOPTING HOUSING-RELATED AMENDMENTS TO THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE SECTION 19.05.040 RESIDENTIAL CLASSIFICATIONS TO INCLUDE A DEFINITION OF SUPPORTIVE HOUSING AND TRANSITIONAL HOUSING; AMEND TABLE 1 IN MUNICIPAL CODE SECTION 19.11.040 TO CLASSIFY EMERGENCY SHELTERS AS A PERMITTED USE IN COMMUNITY COMMERCIAL (CC) ZONING DISTRICT; AMEND TABLE 19.14.050 IN MUNICIPAL CODE TO CLASSIFY EMERGENCY SHELTERS AS A PERMITTED USE IN LIGHT INDUSTRIAL (LI) ZONING DISTRICT; ADD CHAPTER 19.38 EMERGENCY SHELTERS TO THE MUNICIPAL CODE; AND REPEAL AND REPLACE CHAPTER 19.27 HOUSING INCENTIVES WITH THE CURRENT STATE DENSITY BONUS LAW
